CRITICAL ERROR - SECURITY VULNERABILITY DETECTED
==============================================================================

Railway is unable to proceed with the deployment of your service due to one or
more security issues found in your project's dependencies.

To deploy, please address the following vulnerabilities:

  - Dependency: next@16.0.3 [CVE-2025-55183 / GHSA-w37m-7fhw-fmv9 / Severity: MEDIUM]

      ACTION REQUIRED: Upgrade your 'next@16.0.3' package to version 16.0.9 or later by using the following command in your project:

        npm install next@^16.0.9

      For further details about this vulnerability, please refer to the security advisory at https://github.com/vercel/next.js/security/advisories/GHSA-w37m-7fhw-fmv9.

  - Dependency: next@16.0.3 [CVE-2025-55184 / GHSA-mwv6-3258-q52c / Severity: HIGH]

      ACTION REQUIRED: Upgrade your 'next@16.0.3' package to version 16.0.9 or later by using the following command in your project:

        npm install next@^16.0.9

      For further details about this vulnerability, please refer to the security advisory at https://github.com/vercel/next.js/security/advisories/GHSA-mwv6-3258-q52c.

  - Dependency: next@16.0.3 [CVE-2025-66478 / GHSA-9qr9-h5gf-34mp / Severity: CRITICAL]

      ACTION REQUIRED: Upgrade your 'next@16.0.3' package to version 16.0.7 or later by using the following command in your project:

        npm install next@^16.0.7

      For further details about this vulnerability, please refer to the security advisory at https://github.com/vercel/next.js/security/advisories/GHSA-9qr9-h5gf-34mp.

  - Dependency: next@16.0.3 [CVE-2025-67779 / GHSA-5j59-xgg2-r9c4 / Severity: HIGH]

      ACTION REQUIRED: Upgrade your 'next@16.0.3' package to version 16.0.10 or later by using the following command in your project:

        npm install next@^16.0.10

      For further details about this vulnerability, please refer to the security advisory at https://github.com/vercel/next.js/security/advisories/GHSA-5j59-xgg2-r9c4.
